name: penguin-tales
description: Procedural world history generation framework and penguin domain
author: Tsonu

scripts.build: npm run build:framework && npm run build:domain
scripts.generate:llm: cd penguin-tales/lore && LLM_ENABLED=partial npm run dev
scripts.generate:llm:full: cd penguin-tales/lore && LLM_ENABLED=full npm run dev
scripts.sync: cp penguin-tales/lore/output/generated_world.json apps/lore-weave/webui/public/ && cp penguin-tales/lore/output/lore.json apps/lore-weave/webui/public/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'âœ… World data synced to webui'
scripts.generate:sync: npm run generate && npm run sync
scripts.generate:sync:llm: npm run generate:llm && npm run sync
scripts.generate:sync:llm:full: npm run generate:llm:full && npm run sync
scripts.ui:build: npm run sync && cd apps/lore-weave/webui && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run generate:sync && npm run ui
scripts.test: npm run test:framework && npm run test:domain
scripts.clean: npm run clean:framework && npm run clean:domain && npm run clean:output
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/lore-weave && npm install && cd ../name-forge && npm install && cd ../../penguin-tales/lore && npm install && cd ../../apps/lore-weave/webui && npm install
